name: Counter Aim: Operation chaos
description:
Counter Aim 3 is a shooter with realistic graphics and shooting.
Several types of weapons, skins, a system for changing weapons, several types of operators for each of their weapons and add-ons, as well as several regions for a comfortable little ping.
Even if there is no one on the server, there are always bots with you you will not get bored. And also a system of ranks, advanced customization of creating games, vehicles, several grenades and that's not all!
Take your friends and run to play!
